title: Raimondo: See a Way to Use ‘Appropriate' Tariffs on China
description: Former U.S. Secretary of Commerce Gina Raimondo discusses the recent U.S. Supreme Court decision striking down global tariffs implemented during the Trump administration. She speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on "The Close." (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Former U.S. Secretary of Commerce Gina Raimondo discusses the recent U.S. Supreme Court decision striking down global tariffs implemented during the Trump administration. She speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on "The Close." (Source: Bloomberg)
